website_summaries.verdict: The Contour GPS sports camera is the sweet spot in Contour's sports camera lineup, offering most of the features that most owners will find useful, and at an affordable price.
pros: The ContourGPS is compact and configurable, yet also extremely easy to pick up and use
Laser sights and a rotating lens help to aim the camera while mounted without the need for a viewfinder
The camera can connect to an Android or iOS device using an app for live view and adjustment of settings
cons: Using the live-view function with an iPhone requires a $30 Connect View card

customer_reviews.title: Buggy
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to see why GoPro is doing well, and Contour went out of business. My camera never worked quite right. After a short time recording, it would stop any further recording without having to reformat an SD card. It doesn't matter if it was the same one it was just using, or a new one. You would just have to reformat again for no good reason if you wanted to keep recording. I'm not made of money and spare SD cards to wipe clean just to record another short session. So I sold this thing off and picked up a GoPro hero 3+ silver, which is the best camera I've ever had, not a single hiccup yet with it.
customer_reviews.author: captainkirk

customer_reviews.title: The software is horrible to use
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced, overly complicated. Bluetooth connection is a hit and miss (three different Android Devices). The software is horrible to use. GPS function is random. There is nothing positive about this device other than its streamline profile. Was better than racing around with a brick on my helmet. But again, would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Fred P.

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet camera
customer_reviews.text: Camera is amazingly flexible in programming features. When riding, I found audio to be relatively poor, may be related to filtering of ambient noise........ Audio was good in low noise environments. Video and still photos are of excellent quality and the GPS feature is very useful when editing video and photos weeks later when you are not sure exactly where you were when a photo or video footage was shot. Camera is very aerodynamic when mounted on motorcycle helmet. Very little noticeable drag, even at very high speed. Looking forward to using camera at Sturgis in August.
customer_reviews.author: Road King

customer_reviews.title: A nice Buy
customer_reviews.text: A little bit older camera than my Contour roam 3 but still an excellent buy that I use on my motorcycle with my other camera
customer_reviews.author: Larry Howard

customer_reviews.title: Love it - mostly
customer_reviews.text: What I like most about this camera is how easy it is to know if you are taking video or not. The slide on top of the camera turns recording on and off, and unlike with other helmet cams that use a push button, it's easy to tell which direction the slide is in. What I like least is that it's impossible to tell what you are filming. The camera will give you a preview using bluetooth and a smartphone (iPhone adapter cost $30 extra), but it's not live action. Battery life is mediocre.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. R. King

customer_reviews.title: ContourGPS
customer_reviews.text: Good video quality when in 1080p mode. Battery life is acceptable but not really impressive. 2GB memory card it is too small, recommend to get 16-32GB, and an extra battery. Perfect size and easy to use. If you get the ContourGPS it does not includes the card to connect to Bluetooth, like the Contour+. GPS antena is weak and will not work well even under a tree. Overall it is a good product for video, but do not expect great GPS accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Torres

customer_reviews.title: Terrible to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought one in last Christmas but only used it 3 times in the past half year. Frank to say, it is a disapointed shopping and the camera is too difficult to use with below problems: 1. The power on/off button didn't work well and it usually took me several times to turn off the machine; 2. The battery is not good and it only work less than 2 hours with full-charged battery; 3. The body of the camera turned too hot during long recording. I am not sure whether it is the product design issue or it is only quality problem for my camera, but I really don't suggest to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Leo King

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera for my mom as a Christmas gift for her bike. She LOVES it as it obviously not only records her trip but her speed and altitude, which is great for cycling. I'm happy because she's happy, just wish the battery would last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Tank-Less

customer_reviews.title: Much Better
customer_reviews.text: Much better than my first VHoldR camera. This however is a replacement for the first defective ContourGPS Camera they sent me. No wind noise, and a nice high quality 1080 image. The helmet mount however seems to be shaking too much. My videos are bouncing during the trip down the mountain.
customer_reviews.author: nightphotog

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after 2 hours
customer_reviews.text: This camera won't work after 2 hours Change battery still won't work Change SD card still won't work great picture clear and sharp right up till it locks up and cannot use it You have to hard reset and loose all video's you just took Contour won't replace it
customer_reviews.author: John Davies

customer_reviews.title: good camera, poor concept
customer_reviews.text: The camera itself is quite nice with good sound sensitivity and sharp images. However, the fittings and accessories are somehow expensive and not really quite versatile to adapt to many outdoors applications. Battery life is below expectations and sometimes the camera heats up with no apparent reason and stops recording. System freezes once in a while and battery has to be removed to have it off. Good camera, but surely needs a lot of improvement. Not sure I would get the same one if this one eventually breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Jet Stream

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, newer versions are available
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, newer versions are available. Only downside is the wifi app connection. I consistently have problems connecting to my smart phone, LG g3.
customer_reviews.author: Idahoan

customer_reviews.title: A very good buy
customer_reviews.text: Camera works fine, beautiful HD video, sound is good, does the job. Has to sand a bit the mounts in order to slide in & out easier. The first set up was a bit tricky, specially the GPS, but I am new in this type of thing and had to invest some time via youtube (plenty of help there), but others may find it simpler. In sunny days the picture is gorgeous, although snowboarding under snow and or rain will wet the lens and ruin the picture quality, but I guess this is true for any other camera. Overall, a good buy for me, but I did not try other video camera of comparable price range to compare.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Mounting seems an afterthought
customer_reviews.text: I have the Contour GPS and just have to say the camera is OK, the mounting options are poor. Also the failure to provide a standard 1/4 x 20 camera mount just means throwing money away trying to mount the camera. I'd look at other options.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wheelock

customer_reviews.title: Worst software in bluetooth and app history
customer_reviews.text: THIS CAMERA DOES NOT WORK! most the time it won't connect to the iphone or ipad. If I can get it connect the app freezes. The hardware is maybe ok... I don't cause the software just doesn't work. Send this camera back to the 90's. This is an over priced piece of crap!
customer_reviews.author: zoidberg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera
customer_reviews.text: The video and audio quality is great with this camera. We use it at work and I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Salvatore

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: High quality build, very easy to operate. Excellent picture quality and wide angle, but not so wide that the image is too distorted. Some issues with the battery clip, but as long as you are careful when removing the battery it should be ok. Get a 32 Gb card the 2Gb supplied way to small for any extended recording.
customer_reviews.author: Arief Irwan Latif

customer_reviews.title: ContourGPS
customer_reviews.text: Bought the camera to mount to my motorcycle helmet. Great camera! The GPS addition with mapping is a great addition to the videos you produce.
customer_reviews.author: Cabernetnut

customer_reviews.title: Would be great if the battery worked
customer_reviews.text: This camera is small and compact which is great! It's light and simple to flip the record on/off switch which is awesome when doing fast paced sports. Unfortunately, the camera didn't even turn on after charging it for an entire night. Purchasing new battery in hopes that it will work!!
customer_reviews.author: Mfpipkin

customer_reviews.title: Contour GPS
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive the cam but when the GPS was off 150 yards to me it is worthless. Tec say it's tolerance is 50 metres (150 ft) which is a lot. I am going to return the unit and am thinking of getting the 1300 Contour HD as why pay for GPS if it doesn't work properly. The provided software is basic and needs a lot of improvement so I don't even use it. The manual is also not detailed enough. The Cautions, Warranties and Disclaimers are longer than the instructions! I would not recommend this product to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: GDB

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I got my item on time. Camera works great.... I just ordered the contour connect so that I can use my phone as a view finder. But over all great camera, will do business again.
customer_reviews.author: TerryB

customer_reviews.title: user unfriendly
customer_reviews.text: I can not believe how hard it is to get this camera to do anything ,myself and a coworker have been trying to just get the camera to shoot some footage with this product for 3 days with zero success, I would not recommend this product and will be returning it for a full refund if I do not get it going today.
customer_reviews.author: Ramzys

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this so that I could use the Bluetooth to view the camera on my iPhone. It's very choppy, and when I click record I lose my Bluetooth connection. Not what I was looking for!! Can't believe this costs double the price just to get this crappy feature!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Knudson

customer_reviews.title: the worst camera
customer_reviews.text: this contour gps did not work well at all, i sent it back because the power button did not work.
customer_reviews.author: R. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Contour gps
customer_reviews.text: This is a excelent camera, the unique bad thing is the sound with the air because crach in front the camera
customer_reviews.author: CESART125

customer_reviews.title: Great POV Cam
customer_reviews.text: Delivered Promptly. Works as advertised. Great support from company website. Direct emails with answers to my questions, even on Sunday.
customer_reviews.author: grillednutria

customer_reviews.title: Poor condition
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my husband. The packaging was crushed, the camera would not turn on after charging and the battery door was broken, returned for refund!
customer_reviews.author: BubbaLu

customer_reviews.title: contourgps camera
customer_reviews.text: i bought this cause my brother in law was going on a trip and wanted it and it was just what he wanted and he thought the price was great !
customer_reviews.author: billy c.

product_meta.title: ContourGPS Camera
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 



Video mapping from the world's smallest and lightest gps video camera. The ContourGPS captures beautiful 1080p video. It utilizes a 135° wide-angle rotating lens that delivers a true high quality image that captures all the action with minimal distortion and fish-eye. It records Full HD in all its glory. 





CONTOURGPS PRODUCT FEATURES:
LOCATION
Add an entire new layer to your storytelling. The built-in GPS receiver tracks your location, speed, and altitude while also recording in beautiful hands free HD. Using our Storyteller application you can assemble and upload your run to contour.com and watch it via interactive map and video player that allows you to rewind, fast forward or click to the best parts in your run. 

HD
The ContourGPS captures beautiful 1080p video. It utilizes a 135° wide-angle lens that delivers a true high quality image that captures all the action with minimal distortion and no fish eye. It records Full HD in all its glory.

We provide several different camera settings so that you can get the shot that best fits your activity. Choose between 3 resolutions and 2 frame rates or a still photo mode.


HANDS FREE
The ContourHD revolutionized the way people shoot and share video by creating the first wearable HD video camera. The Secret? A low profile design mated to the patented TRail™ system that makes it easy to slide and lock to your body, equipment, or vehicle. The camera, at only 5.2 ounces is the smallest and lightest combination of hands-free video and GPS. It's also easy to operate and use. As simple as sliding a single oversized switch forward to start recording, even with a pair of gloves on. In addition we make it simple to line up your shot with a rotating lens and two lasers that assure you get that perfect shot. 

MOBILE
The most connected video camera in the world, ContourGPS has built-in Bluetooth and a mobile App to turn your phone into a wireless viewfinder. Available on the Apple iOS platform, ContourGPS enables your iPhone or iPod Touch to line up your shot and change your settings in real-time. Hands-free video just got a lot more hands-free.

*To use Apple iOS products with a ContourGPS you will need to purchase the Connect View accessory.


AUDIO
The built-in omni-directional microphone captures the rich sounds of the ride. Using AAC Audio Compression, the bottom-facing microphone assures you that you see and hear your adventure. 






ADDITIONAL PRODUCT FEATURES
STORAGE
The compact and lightweight design principle was carried throughout every detail of the ContourGPS. The internal Micro SD card captures hours of HD content while remaining one of the smallest pieces on the camera. When expanded up to 32 GB, it will record over 8 hours of HD content on one card when in Full HD 1080p mode. 

SOFTWARE
We provide the tools for you to download the videos from your camera to your computer in just a few clicks. Editing is as simple as an "Awesome" button to feature the best parts of your story, then you can become the ultimate producer by adding a title, description, and keywords, and epic location of your video.

COMMUNITY
You provide the story, we give you the platform to tell thousands of members just like you. When you want to share it to more than your friends on Contour.com, we make it easy to share to all of your favorite social media sites.

MOUNTS
Dialing in the ideal angle is a critical component to capturing unique footage. ContourGPS makes it easy with custom body, gear or vehicle mounts for the full spectrum of sports from shooting and skiing to high-octane motorized activities. 
See all contour mounts







VIDEO FORMATS
Video Format Resolution Frame Rate 
Full HD 1080p 1920 x 1080 30 fps To capture those awesome moments in the highest resolution available. Tall HD 960p 1280 x 960 30 fps For those sports like surfing that are better suited to a taller image. Action HD 720p 1280 x 720 60 fps When frame rate is more important than resolution. The perfect setting to capture the fastest action. It reduces blur and rolling shutter effect. Contour 720p 1280 x 720 30 fps When space on your card is at a premium and you need to record that last epic adventure. Still Photo 2592 x 1944 3, 5, 10, 30 or 60 sec When you want to freeze frame the action, the photo mode is your perfect shot. You can pick from 5 rates to best capture that moment. 




WHAT'S IN THE BOX?
 

ContourGPS Camera MicroSD Card (2GB) 2 Rotating Surface Mounts Goggle Mount Rechargeable Battery 

USB Cable Lens Cap

feature_bullets: Built-in GPS functionality to capture your location, speed, and elevation
4.3 ounces, the smallest and lightest hands free video camera in the world
Interactive map and video player that allows you to see and control the action as it happens
Omni-directional microphone using AAC Audio Compression

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.1 out of 5 stars100 ratings3.1 out of 5 stars
